text: tatha unhonne kaha jo gyaan[1] nahin rakhate ki allaah hamase baat kyon nahin karata ya hamaare paas koee aayat kyon nahin aatee? isee prakaar kee baat inase poorv ke logon ne kahee thee. inake dil ek samaan ho gaye. hamane unake lie nishaaniyaan ujaagar kar dee hain, jo vishvaas rakhate hain
